## Random Forest model analysis

Purpose of this file is to bring the imputed file from python and use the variables flushed out by random forest to do analysis on the data 

```{r}
library(VIM)
library(dplyr)
library(mice)
library(caret)
library(ggplot2)
library(Hmisc)
library(car)
ames_house_price_train=read.csv("./data/imputedTrainData.csv",na.strings=c("DNE"),check.names = FALSE)
```

## Lasso variables


```{r}
x_rf_variables = ames_house_price %>%  select('OverallQual', 'GrLivArea', 'GarageCars', 'TotalBsmtSF','1stFlrSF', 'BsmtFinSF1', 'FullBath', 'LotArea', 'YearRemodAdd', 'YearBuilt', 'OverallCond', 'GarageYrBlt', 'BsmtFinType1', '2ndFlrSF', 'MSSubClass_30', 'Fireplaces', 'Exterior1st', 'ExterQual','Exterior2nd', 'EnclosedPorch', 'BsmtExposure', 'BldgType_1Fam','TotRmsAbvGrd', 'GarageCond', 'Foundation', 'BsmtFullBath','PavedDrive', 'ScreenPorch', 'HalfBath', 'LandContour_Lvl','Neighborhood_Edwards', 'MSZoning_C', 'Functional','Neighborhood_NWAmes', 'MSSubClass_60', 'LandContour_HLS','MSSubClass_160', 'MSSubClass_80', 'LandContour_Bnk', 'MSSubClass_90','BldgType_Twnhs', 'BldgType_TwnhsE', 'LandContour_Low', '3SsnPorch','BldgType_2FmCon', 'Neighborhood_MeadowV', 'BldgType_Duplex')
```

## Random Forest variables

```{r}
model = lm(log(ames_house_price_train$SalePrice) ~ ., data=x_rf_variables)
summary(model)
plot(model)

```
